definition: mechanical device consisting of a toothed wheel or rack engaged with a pawl that permits it to move in only one direction, move by degrees in one direction only
details:
noun
- mechanical device consisting of a toothed wheel or rack engaged with a pawl that permits it to move in only one direction
= synonyms: rachet, ratch
verb
- move by degrees in one direction only
= example: move by degrees in one direction only
= synonyms: rachet up, ratchet down
